item.title: 亚洲股市回落，比特币因特朗普的兴奋而飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市有所回落，美元则维持在四个月高位，但所有的兴奋点都集中在比特币上，因为投资者押注于可能从唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选中获益的资产，比特币因此飙升至创纪录的峰值。【原文：Asian stocks eased while the dollar held at four-month highs on Tuesday, though all the excitement was centred on bitcoin as it soared to a record peak underpinned by investor bets on assets that are likely to benefit from Donald Trump's election win.】

item.title: 受特朗普提振，比特币涨势破纪录，逼近 90,000 美元
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普当选美国总统以来，人们期待他的政府将对加密货币友好，比特币在周二站上了 90,000 美元的边缘。【原文：Bitcoin stood on the verge of $90,000 on Tuesday, riding a wave of euphoria since the election of Donald Trump as U.S. president on expectations his administration will be crypto friendly.】

item.title: 中国商飞将支线飞机更名为 C909，以推动市场营销
item.description: 中国商飞公司已将其 ARJ21 支线喷气机重新命名为 C909，使该飞机与这家国有企业的其他机型命名惯例保持一致，以取代占主导地位的西方飞机制造商。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC has rebranded its ARJ21 regional jet as the C909, aligning the plane with the state-owned firm's naming convention for its other models as it seeks to present itself as an alternative to dominant Western planemakers.】

item.title: 中国 "光棍节 "落下帷幕，电商企业报告购物人数增长
item.description: 中国最大的电子商务公司阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group）表示，今年的 "光棍节 "销售额 "增长强劲"，购物人数 "创历史新高"。【原文：China's largest e-commerce company Alibaba Group said it recorded "robust growth" in sales and a "record number" of shoppers over this year's Singles' Day sales period, a weeks-long event that ended at midnight on Monday.】

item.title: 油价在受中国刺激政策影响而下跌后稳住阵脚
item.description: 周二早盘，油价变化不大，等待欧佩克月度报告为油价提供进一步方向，此前几个交易日，中国的刺激计划和供应过剩担忧令市场风声鹤唳。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early trading on Tuesday, awaiting further price direction from OPEC's monthly report after China's stimulus plan and oversupply concerns took the wind out of markets in prior sessions.】

item.title: 越南称党领导人与特朗普讨论经济关系
item.description: 越南共产党党魁杜林（To Lam）在电话中祝贺唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选。【原文：Vietnam's Communist Party head To Lam has congratulated Donald Trump on his U.S. presidential election victory in a phone call and the two discussed ways their countries could boost economic ties, the communist party said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易加剧，美元随比特币飙升；欧元、人民币受挫
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币的汇率接近四个月来的最高点，而比特币则延续了创纪录的涨势，原因是投资者继续涌入被视为受益于即将上台的唐纳德-特朗普政府的交易。【原文：The U.S. dollar traded close to a four-month peak versus major peers on Tuesday, while bitcoin extended its record rally as investors continued to pile into trades seen as benefiting from the incoming Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济部长暗示可能对美国实施关税报复
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛-埃布拉德（Marcelo Ebrard）周一表示，如果即将上任的特朗普政府对墨西哥出口商品征收关税，墨西哥政府可能会对美国进口商品征收关税进行报复。【原文：Mexico's Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard suggested on Monday that the Mexican government could retaliate with its own tariffs on U.S. imports if the incoming Trump administration slaps tariffs on Mexican exports.】

item.title: NAB 调查显示，澳大利亚 10 月商业景气指数为近两年来最高
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，10月份澳大利亚企业信心回升至近两年来的最高点，原因是销售表现坚挺，投入成本压力有所缓解。【原文：Australian business confidence rebounded to its highest in almost two years in October as sales proved resilient and pressure on input costs eased, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 纽约时报》技术公会重返工作岗位，谈判将继续进行
item.description: 纽约时报》技术协会周一在 X 上发帖称，该协会将结束在美国总统大选前一天开始的为期一周的罢工，并将于周二恢复工作。【原文：The New York Times Tech Guild is ending a week-long strike that started one day before the U.S. presidential election and will return to work on Tuesday, it said in a post on X on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数 11 月份连续第二个月上升
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，澳大利亚消费者信心指数在11月份连续第二个月大幅上升，达到两年半以来的新高，消费者对经济和财政状况的乐观情绪终于有所转变。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment rose sharply in November for a second straight month, reaching a 2-1/2-year high with the mood on the economy and finances finally turning optimistic, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说：中国的 "光棍节 "是什么，如何庆祝？
item.description: 黑色星期五？网络星期一？没有。黄金日？绝对不是。世界上最大的购物活动每年都在中国举行，它被称为 "光棍节"。【原文：Black Friday? No. Cyber Monday? Nope. Prime Day? Absolutely not. The world's biggest shopping event happens in China each year - and it's called Singles Day.】

item.title: 23andMe 裁员 40%，停止所有治疗项目
item.description: 基因检测公司 23andMe 周一表示，作为重组计划的一部分，公司将裁员约 40%，即 200 人，并停止进一步开发所有疗法。【原文：Genetic testing firm 23andMe said on Monday it is reducing about 40%, or 200 employees, from its workforce and discontinuing further development of all its therapies as part of a restructuring program.】

item.title: 新加坡 Grab 上调年度收入预期，股价大涨
item.description: 新加坡Grab控股公司周一上调了2024财年的收入预期，因为该公司预计其食品外卖和打车业务将强劲增长。【原文：Singapore's Grab Holdings raised its forecast for fiscal 2024 revenue on Monday, as it anticipates robust growth in its food delivery and ride-hailing businesses.】

item.title: Live Nation 因成本下降而实现乐观的季度利润，股价上涨
item.description: 在成本控制的帮助下，Ticketmaster 母公司 Live Nation Entertainment 周一公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，股价在盘后交易中上涨 5.1%。【原文：Ticketmaster-parent Live Nation Entertainment beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Monday, helped by cost controls, sending its shares up 5.1% in extended trading.】

item.title: 早间投标特朗普推动的记录没有动力，也没有债券
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Endeavor 将以约 4.5 亿美元的价格将 OpenBet 和 IMG Arena 出售给管理层领导的集团
item.description: Endeavor Group 体育娱乐公司周一表示，将以约 4.5 亿美元的价格将其 OpenBet 和 IMG Arena 业务出售给由好莱坞实力经纪人阿里-伊曼纽尔（Ari Emanuel）支持的 OB Global 管理集团。【原文：Endeavor Group will sell its OpenBet and IMG Arena businesses to management-led group OB Global backed by Hollywood power broker Ari Emanuel for about $450 million, the sports and entertainment company said on Monday.】

item.title: Chipotle 股东就吝啬份量造成的后果提起诉讼
item.description: 周一，Chipotle Mexican Grill 遭股东起诉，原因是该公司隐瞒了其许多餐厅在份量上的吝啬，迫使连锁店在配料上花费更多，从而损害了其股价。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill was sued on Monday by shareholders for concealing how many of its restaurants were skimping on portions, forcing the chain to spend more on ingredients and hurting its stock price.】

item.title: 特斯拉期权引来 "亢奋 "交易，特朗普胜选令股价飙升
item.description: 投资者纷纷押注特斯拉股票的看涨期权，该股股价创下两年多来的最高水平，投资者押注首席执行官埃隆-马斯克与美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的密切关系可能有利于这家电动汽车制造商。【原文：Investors are piling into bullish options bets on Tesla shares, with the stock hitting its highest level in more than two years on bets that CEO Elon Musk’s close ties to President-elect Donald Trump may benefit the electric car maker.】

item.title: 波音商用飞机质量主管将于 12 月退休
item.description: 波音民用飞机公司质量主管伊丽莎白-伦德（Elizabeth Lund）将于12月退休。【原文：Boeing Commercial Airplanes quality chief Elizabeth Lund -- who has spearheaded the planemaker's improvement plans -- will retire in December, the company said Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Elliott 任命首位女性合伙人，提拔两人进入管理委员会
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周一表示，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）任命了首位女性合伙人，并提拔了两位合伙人进入管理委员会。【原文：Elliott Investment Management named its first female partner and promoted two partners to its management committee, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: Chipotle Mexican Grill 任命 Scott Boatwright 为永久首席执行官
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill 周一任命临时老板斯科特-博特莱特（Scott Boatwright）为该卷饼连锁店的永久首席执行官，几个月前，布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）离职，前往星巴克担任最高职位。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill on Monday named interim boss Scott Boatwright as permanent CEO of the burrito chain, months after Brian Niccol exited the role to take the top job at Starbucks .】

item.title: 中国华为技术公司寻求撤销美国刑事指控
item.description: 华为技术公司（HWT.UL）要求美国法官驳回联邦起诉书中的大部分指控，该起诉书指控这家中国电信公司试图窃取美国竞争对手的技术机密，并在伊朗业务方面误导银行。【原文：Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) asked a U.S. judge to dismiss much of a federal indictment accusing the Chinese telecommunications company of trying to steal technology secrets from U.S. rivals and misleading banks about its business in Iran.】

item.title: FTX 起诉 Binance 及其前首席执行官，索赔 18 亿美元
item.description: 倒闭的加密货币公司 FTX 正在起诉 Binance 及其前首席执行官赵长鹏，指控 FTX 管理层向 Binance 及其高管 "欺诈性转移 "了 18 亿美元。【原文：Collapsed cryptocurrency company FTX is suing Binance and its former CEO Changpeng Zhao, alleging that $1.8 billion was "fraudulently transferred" by FTX management to Binance and its executives.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Moncler 未就收购巴宝莉进行谈判
item.description: 意大利 Moncler 公司 MONC.MI 没有参与收购 Burberry 的谈判。 周一，针对英国《星期日邮报》关于 Moncler 即将竞购巴宝莉的报道，四位接近此事的消息人士称，Moncler 并未就收购巴宝莉进行谈判。【原文：Italy's Moncler MONC.MI is not in talks to take over Burberry , four sources close to the matter said on Monday in response to a report by Britain's Mail on Sunday that a bid by Moncler was imminent.】

item.title: 政府推迟宣布新财政措施，巴西货币走软
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的政府推迟发布人们期待已久的控制支出措施，尽管此前有迹象表明该措施即将宣布，但巴西货币周一还是走软了。【原文：Brazil's currency weakened on Monday as President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's administration postponed the release of long-awaited spending-containment measures, despite earlier signals of an imminent announcement.】

item.title: 贝恩进一步推迟富士软收购要约计划，等待公司批准
item.description: 在与竞争对手巨头 KKR 的收购竞争中，私募股权公司贝恩资本周一宣布，由于仍在等待日本富士软公司的批准，该公司目前预计将于 11 月中下旬启动对该公司的要约收购。【原文：Bain Capital now expects to launch its tender offer for Japan's Fuji Soft in mid-to-late November as it continues to await company approval, the private equity firm announced on Monday, amid a buyout competition with rival giant KKR .】

item.title: 随着 C-390 销售回升，巴西航空工业公司计划在欧洲设立防务办事处
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的防务部门正计划在欧洲开设一个办事处，因为其 C-390 千禧型军用货运飞机在该地区的销售步伐正在加快。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's defense unit is planning to open an office in Europe, as sales of its C-390 Millennium military cargo aircraft gain pace in the region.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将向高盛出售暖通空调公司 Sila
item.description: 摩根士丹利的私募股权部门周一表示，将向高盛另类投资公司（Goldman Sachs Alternatives）出售其家庭服务公司 Sila Services。【原文：Morgan Stanley's private equity arm said on Monday it would sell its home services company, Sila Services, to Goldman Sachs Alternatives.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，比特币大涨引发加密货币空头交易商损失数十亿美元
item.description: 自11月6日以来，加密货币和区块链相关股票的卖空者损失惨重，此前比特币飙升至历史新高，原因是人们乐观地认为美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将实施更有利的监管框架。【原文：Short sellers of cryptocurrency and blockchain-related stocks have suffered heavy losses since Nov. 6, after bitcoin surged to record highs, on optimism U.S. President-elect Donald Trump would implement a more favorable regulatory framework.】
